notes: Ongoing Electronics Recycling Program held the third Saturday of every month from 9AM to 1PM at the Authority's Yard Waste Transfer Facility located off of Flour mill Road in Manchester Township. Before delivering yard waste to the transfer facility, you must stop at the Resource Recovery Center scale house and obtain a gate token (gate token not needed for annual Christmas tree collection program conducted December 26-January 31, the ongoing electronics recycling events and other special programs as designated by the Authority.)
